ctx: intros f g v s H.
exceptions.exn: In environment L : Language Formula := fol.Formula L : Set Formulas := fol.Formulas L : Set System := fol.System L : Type Term := fol.Term L : Set Terms := fol.Terms L : nat -> Set var := fol.var L : nat -> fol.Term L apply := fol.apply L : forall f : Functions L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> fol.Term L equal := fol.equal L : fol.Term L -> fol.Term L -> fol.Formula L atomic := fol.atomic L : forall r : Relations L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r)) -> fol.Formula L impH := fol.impH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L notH := fol.notH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L forallH := fol.forallH L : nat -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L orH := fol.orH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L andH := fol.andH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L existH := fol.existH L : nat -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L iffH := fol.iffH L : fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L -> fol.Formula L SysPrf := folProof.SysPrf L : fol.System L -> fol.Formula L -> Prop f, g : Formula v : nat s : Term H : SysPrf (Ensembles.Add Formula (Empty_set Formula) f) g Unable to unify "exists (Axm : fol.Formulas ?M1420) (_ : Prf ?M1420 Axm (fol.iffH ?M1420 (substituteFormula ?M1420 ?M1424 ?M1422 ?M1423) (substituteFormula ?M1420 ?M1425 ?M1422 ?M1423))), forall g : fol.Formula ?M1420, In g Axm -> mem (fol.Formula ?M1420) ?M1421 g" with "exists (Axm : fol.Formulas L) (_ : Prf L Axm (substituteFormula L g v s)), forall g : fol.Formula L, In g Axm -> mem (fol.Formula L) (Ensembles.Add Formula (Empty_set Formula) (substituteFormula L f v s)) g".

exceptions.exn: In environment H1 : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (f g : fol.Formula L), (In_freeVarSys L v T -> False) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L f g) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L (substituteFormula L f v s) (substituteFormula L g v s)) L : Language f, g : fol.Formula L v : nat s : fol.Term L x : fol.Formulas L x0 : Prf L x g H : forall g : fol.Formula L, In g x -> mem (fol.Formula L) (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula L) (Empty_set (fol.Formula L)) f) g Unable to unify "exists (Axm : fol.Formulas L) (_ : Prf L Axm ?M5204), forall g : fol.Formula L, In g Axm -> mem (fol.Formula L) (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula L) ?M5202 (fol.existH L ?M5205 f)) g" with "exists (Axm : fol.Formulas L) (_ : Prf L Axm (substituteFormula L g v s)), forall g : fol.Formula L, In g Axm -> mem (fol.Formula L) (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula L) (Empty_set (fol.Formula L)) (substituteFormula L f v s)) g".

exceptions.exn: In environment H3 : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (f g : fol.Formula L) (v : nat), (In_freeVarSys L v T -> False) -> (In v (freeVarFormula L g) -> False) -> folProof.SysPrf L (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula L) T f) g -> folProof.SysPrf L (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula L) T (fol.existH L v f)) g H1 : forall (L : Language) (T : fol.System L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (f g : fol.Formula L), (In_freeVarSys L v T -> False) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L f g) -> folProof.SysPrf L T (fol.iffH L (substituteFormula L f v s) (substituteFormula L g v s)) L : Language f, g : fol.Formula L v : nat s : fol.Term L x : fol.Formulas L x0 : Prf L x g H : forall g : fol.Formula L, In g x -> mem (fol.Formula L) (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula L) (Empty_set (fol.Formula L)) f) g Unable to unify "Union (fol.Formula L) (Empty_set (fol.Formula L)) (Singleton (fol.Formula L) f) ?M8641" with "exists (Axm : fol.Formulas L) (_ : Prf L Axm (substituteFormula L g v s)), forall g : fol.Formula L, In g Axm -> mem (fol.Formula L) (Ensembles.Add (fol.Formula L) (Empty_set (fol.Formula L)) (substituteFormula L f v s)) g".

original: intros f g v s H. apply reduceSub. - intros ?. destruct H0. - apply existSys with (f := f). + intros H0. apply (H0 v). apply (freeVarFormula V). + intros H0. apply (H0 v). apply (freeVarFormula V). + apply H.
